meanings.definition: To make something known to the public through various forms of media.
meanings.sent1: Local businesses often advertise their products on billboards.
meanings.sent2: Companies advertise their new products on television to reach more customers.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to advertise its cuteness by meowing loudly at the door.
meanings.sent4: The colorful flowers in the garden advertise the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The bright neon sign outside the store advertised a big sale.

meanings.definition: To promote or sell a product or service through marketing strategies.
meanings.sent1: During the holiday season, stores advertise special discounts to attract shoppers.
meanings.sent2: Successful companies often advertise their brand through social media campaigns.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to advertise his disappearing act as the best in town.
meanings.sent4: The delicious aroma from the bakery advertised freshly baked bread to passersby.
meanings.sent5: The catchy jingle in the commercial advertised the new soft drink.
